snippet: The United Nations says access to contraception is a universal human right that could significantly improve the lives of women and children in poor countries.
abstract: United Nations report says access to contraception is universal human right that could significantly improve lives of women and children in poor countries.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations says access to contraception is a universal human right that could significantly improve the lives of women and children in poor countries.

headline.seo: United Nations Supports Access to Contraception
